name: Architha Julakanti
summary: Software developer focused on building reliable, data-driven web apps and automations with Python, React/JavaScript, AWS (Lambda, S3), and MySQL. Recent work for an Amazon client includes fleet-monitoring automation, CI/CD pipelines, and production support. Previously at TCS, delivered Python/Django services and integrations across the SDLC, modernized legacy systems, and improved code quality with Git/Jira. Projects include real-time suspicious-activity detection (CNN) and an AI customer-support chatbot.
